General.Name: Aeluma Inc.
General.Description: Aeluma, Inc. develops optoelectronic devices for sensing and communications applications. It manufactures devices using compound semiconductor materials on diameter silicon wafers that are used to manufacture mass market microelectronics. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Goleta, California.
General.Address: 27 Castilian Drive, Goleta, CA, United States, 93117
